<title level="1" pfs="">[Farmer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3492)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Workers of the fields, vineyards, and orchards of the world, farmers are known for their rugged endurance and skill with plants and animals.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Farmer.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Farmer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3492)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 67

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +5, [Farming Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +4, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
apple, pitchfork, work clothes (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 18

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pitchfork +6 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
apple +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Pitch Bale** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The farmer's last action was a successful pitchfork Strike; **Effect** The farmer [moves](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the creature they hit with their pitchfork up to 5 feet, and the target falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88). The target can attempt a DC 13 Reflex save to avoid falling prone and avoids being moved altogether on a critical success.

</column>
